command.recoverpocket.usage: /recoverpocket <pocket number> (Specifies the pocket to recover) / length (This will show how many pockets exist in the registry)
command.recoverpocket.too.usage: Pocket number specified is more than the amount of pockets in the registry.
command.recoverpocket.wrong_name: You cannot recover this pocket as it does not belong to you.
command.recoverpocket.creative: You must be in Creative mode to use this command.
command.recoverpocket_admin.usage: /recoverpocketadmin <pocket number> (Specifies the pocket to recover) / length (This will show how many pockets exist in the registry)
command.recoverpocket_admin.too.usage: Pocket number specified is more than the amount of pockets in the registry.
command.setspawn.usage: /setspawn (Sets the current position you are standing to the entry point when you enter this pocket.)
